title: LOL IGN CHANGED TO RIOT IGN
body:
When I logged in today after a couple days break it, a notification came up saying that my LoL account needed to become a Riot account. Whatever, it went to change my login username but apparently it was taken. Maybe someone from NA already signed up or something. Anyway, i change my username and relog back into lol using the new user and pass, no problems.  
  
However, now my friends list doesn't show. It says everyone is offline and keeps disconnecting and reconnecting me.   
  
Went on my smurf, and no prompt to change account to a riot account. Friends list works fine no problems.  

What the fuck is going on????? My Main is unplayable....

replies.body: have you fixed ur problem? Mine is doing the same thing keep disconnecting and reconnecting!!!
Nah, it's still bugged. I sent a ticket to riot, waiting for a response still

Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll probably ask you for some logs but they should be able to point you in the right direction (or if it's a widespread issue, track it).
